caption.p: 3D and 2D representation of the best key interactions in the binding pocket for selected ligands and receptors whether, (A and B) represents prostaglandin – 1 (PDB ID: 2OYE), pongamol; (C and D) represents prostaglandin – 2 (PDB ID: 6COX), lanceolatin – B; (E and F) represents 5-HT3 receptor (PDB ID: 5AIN) and milletenone; respectively.
